channel.title: Need help 317
channel.description:
ok well, how do i change the starter stuff off a player. like the inventory and the equipment. and always when i do something there comes: id button: ex; 1445 how can u do that away? i'm using zeroscape v1.0 as base. thanks for helping
halflive9

item.title: Need help 317
item.dc:creator: @starstorm starstorm
item.description:
@starstorm wrote:

ok i can help u with the first part but the second part i have no idea what ur talking about lol, well anyways go into client.java in your source search “if(starter == 0)” then u should find the code area and it should look like this

[code]if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;

	    showInterface(3559);
	    apset = true;

tradeTimer = 1200;
addItem(995, 5000000);
addItem(1323, 1);
addItem(1725, 1);
addItem(3105, 1);
addItem(7458, 1);
if (playerHasItem(1050,1))
deleteItem(1050,1);
}[/code]
and delete or add lines of add item… the first set of numbers in additem() means what the item id is and the second set of numbers i how many you want to give… this is going of my source im not sure if ur source is different but hope i helped

Read full topic
